title: Zesty pineapple chicken
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons soy sauce', '3 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt to taste', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '500g chicken breast fillets, cut in strips against the grain', '1 red pepper, cut into 1cm pieces', '1 bunch spring onions, sliced into 2cm pieces', '1 (350g) tin pineapple pieces, juice reserved', '1 tablespoon cornflour']
